nodes.text: A battle at the planet Glova occurred not long after the Nagai–Tof War. Admiral Nantz was given command of the First Fleet, tasked with operations in the galaxy's Western Reaches. He staged his campaign from the planet Saijo after the end of the Nagai-Tof War.
From there, Nantz took the First at Glova—assisted by ground forces commanded by General Tyr Taskeen—forced Warlord Delvardus' military into retreat from the system.
The capture of Glova cut Delvardus off from potential reinforcements from Imperial forces stationed further down the Rimma Trade Route in the Elrood sector and Minos Cluster.
